elements.name: As an admin user, I should be able to build a template from scratch

steps.name: user is on shopify dashboard "shopify_email", "shopify_password"
user selects the store "Staging May 2 Test Store 1"
selects the Rippl Reward staging extension
navigates to Add Ways to Earn - Build From Scratch

fills up the build from scratch form with appropriate data "challenge_name", "Engage in a variety of fitness activities", "Participants will receive a bingo card with various fitness-related activities in each square, such as jogging for 30 minutes, completing a yoga session, or doing 50 push-ups. They must complete these activities to mark off the corresponding squares on their card. The goal is to achieve a bingo pattern (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) within the given timeframe", "12-20-2024", "11-30-2026", "base_tier", "send evidence", "1", "1", "1", "1", "abhik.khandelwal01@gmail.com", "test", "Drink a glass of water"

arguments.val: "Engage in a variety of fitness activities"

"Participants will receive a bingo card with various fitness-related activities in each square, such as jogging for 30 minutes, completing a yoga session, or doing 50 push-ups. They must complete these activities to mark off the corresponding squares on their card. The goal is to achieve a bingo pattern (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) within the given timeframe"

steps.name: uploads banner image and publishes the challenge
verify created "challenge_name" is displayed in Ways to Earn challenges list

verify created challenge contains exactly the same details filled in the form during creation  "challenge_name", "Engage in a variety of fitness activities", "Participants will receive a bingo card with various fitness-related activities in each square, such as jogging for 30 minutes, completing a yoga session, or doing 50 push-ups. They must complete these activities to mark off the corresponding squares on their card. The goal is to achieve a bingo pattern (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) within the given timeframe", "12-20-2024", "11-30-2026", "base_tier", "send evidence", "1", "1", "1", "1", "abhik.khandelwal01@gmail.com", "test", "Drink a glass of water"

arguments.val: "Engage in a variety of fitness activities"

"Participants will receive a bingo card with various fitness-related activities in each square, such as jogging for 30 minutes, completing a yoga session, or doing 50 push-ups. They must complete these activities to mark off the corresponding squares on their card. The goal is to achieve a bingo pattern (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) within the given timeframe"

steps.name: verify the created "challenge_name" is visible on user dash widget under Actions for Base_Tier customers "base_tier"
verify user can view the challenge "challenge_name" in widget dash only if the challenege status <challenge_status> is set as active
verify user is assigned and able to view base tier "base_tier" by default in widget dash
verify same "Engage in a variety of fitness activities" is visible on user dash widget under Actions just below the "challenge_name"

verify same "Participants will receive a bingo card with various fitness-related activities in each square, such as jogging for 30 minutes, completing a yoga session, or doing 50 push-ups. They must complete these activities to mark off the corresponding squares on their card. The goal is to achieve a bingo pattern (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) within the given timeframe" is visible under details when user selects the "challenge_name"
verify user can view same "send evidence" in widget dash while completing the challenge set during challenge creation
verify user is able to complete the "challenge_name" only once
verify users account is credited with the same "1" on completing the "challenge_name" which was configured
verify on approving the completed action, a "Drink a glass of water" configured in the challenge is created in the Tasks
verify imapct reward point "1" should only be credited to the users account if the action is approved
verify on completing an action "challenge_name" a confirmation email should be sent to the registered users email address
verify user can not view the challenge "challenge_name" in widget dash if the challenege status <challenge_status> is set as Inactive
verify user can not view the challenge "challenge_name" in widget dash after the challenge is expired "11-30-2026"

name: Ways to Earn
description: I want to use this template for my feature file
